name: FirstBreak Concrete Test File
summary: File used by FirstBreak, a program that tests the strengths of concrete mixes; contains the test results of concrete batches, including the batch reference, date, test specimen strengths, slump, air content, and temperature.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Appears in folders in window when connecting Sony/Panasonic camcorder or memory card to computer.
Maxis Sim Tower: The Vertical Empire
